name: Water Flask
desc: A specialized flask of water often utilized by Waterbound as a mobile source of water.
effect: While full, this may be used as a Water _Source_ with a value of 1. When empty, it may not be used until filled again. When empty, this has no weight.
special: As a 1 _AP_ _Action_ you may _Draw_ 1 from an adjacent _Source_ to fill this. If you are a Waterbound, you may instead replace any _Minor Attack_ to instead _Draw_ 1 from a _Source_ within Range 4 to fill this or, when you would place _Wet_ Terrain, you may place one less space to fill this.
